response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This amount reflects the balance between the product's intrinsic value to you and my asking price, aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing our collaboration.", "product_price": 12000}
